verbs.description: I [V: was] struck by two Oregonian / OregonLive articles -- one laying out changes being imposed by the White House on women 's health ( " Trump remaking federal policy on women 's reproductive health , " May 30 ) and the other touting vasectomy as the preferred procedure of family planning ( " When it comes to family planning , vasectomy is the preferred technique , " June 3 ) . Once again , anti - choice lawmakers ( mostly men ) are imposing their opinion on countless women , forcing the birth of an unwanted or unsupported child , while at the same time cutting funding for prenatal and postnatal care . Love for the fetus , indifference for the mother and child . Vasectomies are safer , simpler , cheaper and more effective than pills , devices , " methods " or abstinence . But this administration again pushes the historically favored paternalistic , unilateral approach of encumbering women . Where are the men ? I can not recall the number of times I 've heard a man say , " I 'm not doin' that ! " As if it is some form of " man - ectomy . " Too many men seem to equate vasectomy with castration . This is not just a young man 's issue . As a 60-plus - year - old childless , vasectomized man , I say it is time for real men to either put up or shut up . Scott K. Isler , Northeast Portland ...

Once again , anti - choice lawmakers ( mostly men ) are imposing their opinion on countless women , forcing the birth of an unwanted or unsupported child , while at the same time cutting funding for prenatal and postnatal care . Love for the fetus , indifference for the mother and child . Vasectomies are safer , simpler , cheaper and more effective than pills , devices , " methods " or abstinence . But this administration again pushes the historically favored paternalistic , unilateral approach of encumbering women . Where are the men ? I can not recall the number of times I 've heard a man say , " [ARG0: I] 'm [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: doin'] [ARG1: that] ! " As if it is some form of " man - ectomy . " Too many men seem to equate vasectomy with castration . This is not just a young man 's issue . As a 60-plus - year - old childless , vasectomized man , I say it is time for real men to either put up or shut up . Scott K. Isler , Northeast Portland ...
